title: ReferenceError: artifacts is not defined

body: Hi @CleoPatra2772, you are using an outdated Truffle version. Can you upgrade and see if it resolves your issue? To upgrade: `npm -g uninstall truffle && npm -g install truffle`. Thanks!

> Hi @CleoPatra2772, you are using an outdated Truffle version. Can you upgrade and see if it resolves your issue? To upgrade: `npm -g uninstall truffle && npm -g install truffle`. Thanks!

Yep. It seems to be the problem. thanks !
